string-array.name: activity_level_array
string-array.item: Light: exercise 1 to 3 times a week
Moderate: exercise 4 to 5 times a week
Active: daily ex. or INTENSE exercise 3 times a week
Very Active: INTENSE exercise 6 to 7 times a week

string-array.name: target_weight_loss_array
string-array.item: Mild Weight Loss (0.25 kg per week)
Extreme Weight Loss (1 kg per week)
